name: Draw With Tiles!
description:
IMPORTANT (please read): For best preformance use the downloadable version because on some browsers the browser version has some scaling issues.

This is a simple game about drawing with tiles. The main idea is that the game will generate a grid with lots of tiles which you can delete using your mouse cursor. Art/Coding/sound effects made by me.

Big thanks to the beta testers:

https://twitter.com/stealthific Thaumazo
